model.weapon
Class AbstractWeapon

java.lang.Object
  model.weapon.AbstractWeapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITaggable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Grenade, MachineGun, Melee, PortalGun, Sword
public abstract class AbstractWeapon
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITaggable

A weapon. Got ammo, a character owner and parameters for firing properties.

Author:
Johan

owner - This weapon's owner

ammoMultiplier - The ammo multiplier
fireInterval - The fire interval

AbstractWeapon

public AbstractWeapon(AbstractCharacter owner,
                      org.json.JSONObject obj)
A weapon from a JSON object.

The JSON object must contain the keys ammo, ammoMultiplier, and fireInterval.

Parameters:
owner - The character owner
obj - The JSON object

addAmmo

public void addAmmo(int amount)
Add ammo

Parameters:
amount - The amount

fire

public Projectile fire()
Fire this weapon and return the resulting projectile.

Sends a FIRED_WEAPON_SUCCESS event with the resulting Projectile as value on successful fire, i.e. if the weapon had enough ammo and it's not in a cooldown.

.

Sends a FIRED_WEAPON_FAIL event with the Projectile of the firing was unsuccessful.

.

Returns:
The projectile from this weapon, or null on failure

inCooldown

public boolean inCooldown()
subtracts dt from the current cooldown, if cooldown is zero or below, resets the cooldown and returns false, else returns true.

Parameters:
dt -
Returns:
